entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
